tree-work-details.description: Crown reduction of mature oak tree (T1) by 25% to reduce weight on extended limbs and improve structural stability. Selective pruning of silver birch (T2) to remove dead and crossing branches. All work to be carried out in accordance with British Standard BS 3998:2010.

tree-details.description-of-works: Crown reduction by 25% to reduce weight on extended limbs over neighbouring property. Remove dead wood and improve structural integrity.
Selective pruning to remove dead, diseased and crossing branches. Crown lift to 3m above ground level.
